answers.answer: I'm going through the same. I've lost over 10lbs and am 16 weeks. As long as you are taking your vitamins and drinking enough water, its OK. Usually you will start gaining in your 2nd trimester.

I had and still have the same thing going on..my ob wanted me to gain 15lbs during this pregnancy but I've only gained a total of 9lbs..I'll be 28 weeks tomorrow but I still sometimes get sick and now I have gestational diabetes..but the only thing I did when I was that early in my pregnancy was soup and crackers,or something light..and drink plenty of water so you won't get dehydrated cause it's not fun trust me lol but you will get better hun and congrats

I lost weight every week until I got to 17 weeks. I've not gained a huge amount since and only within the 'normal' weight gain range this week (I'm 35 wks) Stay hydrated and eat when you can-your little baba will be just fine :-)

question: I'm 2 days away from being 11 weeks and instead of gaining weight I'm loosing weight and still very sick with morning sickness which in my case is all day sickness getting very worried here does anyone have any suggestions?  Thanks
title: loosing weight
